img_summary: The image depicts a snowy mountainous landscape with steep cliffs and rocky terrain. In the foreground, a large creature with bat-like wings is visible, suggesting it is flying or gliding through the scene. The background features towering snow-covered peaks under a clear blue sky, creating a dramatic and expansive view.
